Package it.polimi.ingsw

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Selectable
    Interface for the onSelection method, the method used by all the marbles when they are selected by a player.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActionCard
    Abstracted class that represent the three different types of ActionCard
    ActionCardStack
    This class represent a deck of ActionCards
    Deck
    The Deck of the DevelopmentCards
    Deckgrid
    It's the grid of DevelopmentCards, organized by level and color.
    DevelopmentCard
    The Development card can activate the "production power" for a resource, each card has a cost, a level and gives you victory points.
    ExtraDeposit
    Represent the extra deposit create with the power of the LeaderCard
    Game
    Main class: Users actions are managed by Game class.
    LeaderCard
    Abstracted class that represent the four different types of LeaderCard
    LeaderCardDeck
    This class represent a deck of ActionCards
    Level
    This class represents a level of the game's warehouse.
    LorenzoSingleton
    This class represent the single player mode of the game
    Marble
    This class represents a Marble.
    MarketBoard
    The board where all the Marbles are stored.
    PersonalBoard
    This class represent the board that every player had, it is composed by different items and include different board
    Player
    The class representing the player, contains all his attributes and his game objects such as the personal board.
    Starter  
    Strongbox  
    WareHouseDepot
    Represents the warehouse depot.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Colour
    Public enumeration Differentiate the various types of colors
    ResourceType
    Public enumeration Differentiate the various types of resources
